title: If you slipped on a banana peel and met your end, would you want people to know? - Quora

response.answer_text: http://F.ck ya! Dying is so hard on the associated living that I think it would be great to have that the actual C.O.D. Ya, I would want people to know. If it sounds embarrassing….you're dead, you PROBABLY won't care. But the live ones remain scared of death and love it when dead people get there with out knowing it. The majority of causes of deaths are, well, mortifying. Having a banana peel to blame may be frustrating to the people left to mourn; “If only she picked things up” or , “Paying attention never KILLED anybody”. I would really want people to know because it's almost funny.
Yes I want as many people as possible to know so that they will be more cautious about stepping on a banana peel.
